name: Online-data-entry-
tagline: The Way Of Technologies ! Josoft  ! We create what you think
body:
Welcome to Josoft Technologies.

JOSOFT Technology Pvt. Ltd. is a leading IT consulting and service provider company, offering a range of expertise aimed at helping customers re-engineer and re-invent their businesses to compete successfully in an ever-changing market. highly-skilled professionals in JOSOFT Technology work Onsite, Offsite, Offshore and Near shore, to provide customized IT solutions for companies across several industries. JOSOFT Technology understands the requirements to build, test, support and implement on complex products, which form a very critical part of clients' software environment. JOSOFT Technology also participates in the internationalization/localization, as well as ensuring that these products can be ported to as many platforms as possible, and can interface with other software products. JOSOFT Technology also has expertise in testing the usability of these products.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out the documentation at [http://www.josoftech.com](http://www.josoftech.com) or contact [support@josoftech.com](support@josoftech.com) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.

### Also Contact On This Number

       Hazratganj Lucknow 226001
